column1: (Adapted from darg_sama's) Balancing a branch on your finger is the prototypical example of a skill that is nothing more than a skill (i.e., it is completely useless).
Unlike in  , this big mouth isn't content to wait for apricots to fall in his mouth, so he has climbed the tree and is taking them in bundles.
Spiderman is watching his weight and trying to become slender, so instead of eating a whole turkey for Thanksgiving, he decides to only eat a penguin.
I guess this kanji proves it's not just the Welsh whose idea of beauty is a large sheep.
(Elaboration of jameserb's story:) A clever scheme from Wile E Coyote  he ties one of those rubber belts to some trees and uses it to launch a bamboo spear at the roadrunner...
The women in the village formed a committee to walk off with the wheat...
Only a FEW WOMEN are EXQUISITE.
obituary: Harry Potter's obituary was just a few words long: 'Guy who killed Voldemort'. He was buried with his favourite magic wand that he used to perform all of his augury.
